name: listrak-pixel
title: Listrak
description: An implementation of Listrak conversion tracking

merchantId.title: Merchant ID
merchantId.description: Enter your Merchant ID for Listrak

subscriptionPoint.title: Subscription Point ID
subscriptionPoint.description: Enter the `Subscribe ID` of the email Subscription Point from your Listrak account

subscriptionIds.title: Subscription Form IDs
subscriptionIds.description: Enter IDs of any subscription email input and associated submit button, separated by commas

emailInputIds.title: Email Input Field IDs for Abandonment
emailInputIds.description: Enter IDs of any email input fields you wish to be tracked for abandonment, separated by commas

prefCenterName.title: Preference Center Name
prefCenterName.description: Enter the value to be inserted in the 'data-ltk-prefcenter' property of the div on the Preference Center page

useRefId.title: Use Reference Id
useRefId.description: Use reference Id rather than product id to link reviews to products

fullCatalogImport.title: Full Catalog Import
fullCatalogImport.description: Import your full product catalog to Listrak on the next SKU update
